imdb.plot outline: State-of-the-art spy cameras track polar bears in Norway, revealing the daily life, curiosity and intelligence of the massive and beautiful predators. Massive, beautiful predators, threatened by climate change. High-tech spy cameras in Norway capture their daily lives.
